metadata.title: CVE-2020-29002 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: includes/CologneBlueTemplate.php in the CologneBlue skin for MediaWikithrough 1.35 allows XSS via a qbfind message supplied by an administrator.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
